Detailed Description

Implement this interface for your own strategies for printing log statements.

void log4cpp::Appender::close ( ) [pure virtual]
 

Release any resources allocated within the appender such as file handles, network connections, etc.

Reimplemented in log4cpp::FileAppender, log4cpp::OstreamAppender, and log4cpp::SyslogAppender.

Log in Appender specific way.

event   The LoggingEvent to log.

Appender * log4cpp::Appender::getAppender ( const string & name ) [static]
 

Get a pointer to an exitsing Appender.

Parameters:
name   The name of the Appender to return.
Returns:
a pointer to an existing Appender, or NULL if no appender with the specfied name exists.

const string & log4cpp::Appender::getName ( ) const [inline]
 

Get the name of this appender.

The name identifies the appender.

Returns:
the name of the appender.

bool log4cpp::Appender::reopen ( ) [virtual]
 

Reopens the output destination of this Appender, e.g.

the logfile or TCP socket.

Returns:
false if an error occured during reopening, true otherwise.

Reimplemented in log4cpp::FileAppender, log4cpp::OstreamAppender, and log4cpp::SyslogAppender.

bool log4cpp::Appender::reopenAll ( ) [static]
 

Call reopen() on all existing Appenders.

Returns:
true if all Appenders returned true on their reopen() call.

bool log4cpp::Appender::requiresLayout ( ) const [pure virtual]
 

Check if the appender uses a layout.

If the appender implementation admits a layout but can also work without it, then it should return true.

Reimplemented in log4cpp::FileAppender, log4cpp::OstreamAppender, and log4cpp::SyslogAppender.

void log4cpp::Appender::setLayout ( Layout * layout ) [pure virtual]
 

Set the Layout for this appender.

Parameters:
layout   The layout to use.

Reimplemented in log4cpp::FileAppender, log4cpp::OstreamAppender, and log4cpp::SyslogAppender.
